about_the_game:
Protect your village from Vikings, stopping powerful enemy waves by strategically building towers!

Experience stunning 3D art as you fight across diverse landscapes, customizing your defensive strategy with four unique towers. Unleash special powers to turn the tide of battle and enjoy near limitless freedom in your approach to defending your realm.

Face off against five different enemy types and a formidable boss, all amidst massive enemy swarms that will test your tactical skills to the limit.

Key Features


  • Epic defense battles set in a Viking-themed world!
  • Stunning 3D art that brings your battles to life.
  • Four unique towers, each with three upgrade.
  • Powerful special abilities to aid you in battle.
  • Face five different enemy types and a challenging boss.
  • Near limitless freedom to develop your defensive strategies.
  • Massive enemy swarms that will challenge even the most seasoned defenders.
  • Embark on this thrilling quest to save your kingdom from the forces of Vikings
